Overloaded method EnzymeEntryMapper.findByEc in order to search by EC strings.

Search by EC number excludes now old versions of modified entries.
Removed assertions which just broke completely legal calls in EnzymeSubSubclassMapper.

Closing any resultsets and statements, and checking they are not null.
Added EnzymeReactionMapper field (instead of creating one each time).
Updated to latest intenz-core and rhea-domain.
Generic return type is now especified in EnzymeEntryMapper.
Fixed exception when building a Reaction due to the source being used as the enumeration value instead of the database code.
Updated to latest versions of intenz-core, rhea-domain, rhea-mapper and biobabel-db.
Fixed NPEs in name and link mappers.
Fixed two NPE in reaction and history mappers.

Added class HistoryEventMapper which deprecates EventPackageMapper.

Added method to search preliminary EC numbers.
Updated to latest intenz-core and rhea-mapper modules.
Fixed SQL query to put preliminary EC numbers at the end of the sub-subclass.
Removed useless compile-time dependency on oracle classes.
Updated to latest intenz-core, rhea-mapper - which implements shared attributes in the family and decompositions -, rhea-domain and biobabel-db.
Added implementation for preliminary EC numbers.
Updated to latest intenz-core.
Updated to latest version of rhea.mapper, first available in EBI's public maven repository.
